name: About Me
body:
Hi. I'm Nuttanart Pornprasitsakul or you can call me Tap. I'm a programmer who favor on product quality and life happiness. I'm a generalist but most familiar Ruby on Rails stack. Do some functional programming (Clojure,Elixir) as a hobby.

I know a little about Object-Oriented design, Test-driven development, Developer testing, API design, Agile development practices and I have some experiences on Unix, Redis, Backbone.js, PostgreSQL, Git and Java.

I would love to remote pair programming with anyone on TDD, Ruby, Rails or Elixir.

Click [![Pair program with me!](http://pairprogramwith.me/badge.png)](mailto:visibletrap@gmail.com) or [Tweet Me](https://twitter.com/visibletrap)

### Find out more about me
[Engligh blog](http://visibletrap.blogger.com) where I note down technical solutions of the problems I have encoutered there and sometimes do programming post.

[Thai blog](http://visibletrap.wordpress.com) for software development experiences, programing stuffs and life.

[LinkedIn](http://www.linkedin.com/in/nuttanart) for more formal profile

[Twitter](http://www.twitter.com/visibletrap) I tweet there!

I also write on [ruby66](http://ruby66.com/author/visibletrap) and [agile66](http://www.agile66.com/blogs/author/visibletrap/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
